definition: to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for God's righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 饥渴爱慕神公义的人有福了。

sentences.english: And this feeling of self-respect which I witnessed in him increased my love, my admiration for him.
sentences.chinese: 在他身上看到的自尊加深了我对他的爱慕。

sentences.english: Should be a beauty on the hero's love, right?
sentences.chinese: 应当是一位美人对英雄的爱慕吧？

sentences.english: Somebody said he is the best loved and desired man in the world.
sentences.chinese: 有人说，他是这个世界上最值得爱慕和追求的男人。

sentences.english: When Simba and Nala are alone, they start to realize the depth of their feelings for each other.
sentences.chinese: 他们俩在独处中，感到了深埋在对方心中的爱慕之情。

sentences.english: This is a Valentine from a secret admirer.
sentences.chinese: 这是一位不具名的爱慕者送来的情人节礼物。

sentences.english: He was an enthusiast himself and loved to evoke enthusiasm in others.
sentences.chinese: 他自己就是个文学迷，也爱唤起他人对文学的爱慕。

sentences.english: We could love each other and be like king and queen.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以相互爱慕，就像国王和王后。

sentences.english: Love li shi-mm months let princess, decided to marry li shi-mm.
sentences.chinese: 爱慕李世民的月容公主，决定嫁给李世民。

sentences.english: I have been an admirer of yours for many years.
sentences.chinese: 我多年来都是你的爱慕者。

sentences.english: This fish can show my heart for Stephy Tang to everyone.
sentences.chinese: 这条鱼可表达我对邓丽欣的爱慕。

sentences.english: Circumambulation of the holy places is an act of devotion and love.
sentences.chinese: 圣地绕行是一种处于敬拜和爱慕的行为。

sentences.english: I got a box of chocolate from a secret adorer.
sentences.chinese: 我收到一盒神秘爱慕者送的巧克力。

sentences.english: The girl received a bunch of flowers from her admirer last night.
sentences.chinese: 那女孩收到爱慕者所送的一束花。

sentences.english: A heart whose love is innocent!

definition: to be enamored of/to have tender feelings for/to be sentimentally attached to (a person or place)
in love with/to feel deeply attached to
to be secretly in love with
to admire wholeheartedly/to fall in love with
to be jealous of (sb's achievements etc)/to be envious/envy
first awakening of love (usually of a girl) (idiom)
